description: The New Mefoto DayTrip is a 2-section mini tripod kit available in 8 colors. It features reverse folding legs, a height adjustable center column and rubberized twist locks that are weather and dust-resistant. Each unit comes with a Q00 single action ballhead and mini (No Suggestions) style plate. Its compact size allows the DayTrip to fit into most messenger bags and small backpacks. The DayTrip has an 8.8 lb. payload capacity making this ideal for point and shoot, mirrorless and compact DSLR cameras. Each DayTrip includes a carrying case with shoulder strap.
title: Mefoto A0320Q00K DayTrip Tripod Kit (Black)
